General.Name: Endurance Gold Corp
General.Description: Endurance Gold Corporation focuses on the exploration and development of mineral properties in North America. It explores for gold, niobium, nickel, and rare earth metals. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2E9
